Proceeds of the recording went to the American Red Cross and the United Way. "What More Can I Give" 2003 — — * To commemorate the victims of 11 September attacks. "Somos El Mundo 25 Por Haiti" 2010 31 15 * To raise money for Haitian earthquake victims. "Ay Haiti" — — "Gracias a la Vida" — — * * To raise money for the 2010 Chile earthquake victims.
